meaningMnemonic: The <radical>boat</radical> that <radical>oversee</radical>s other boats, land, and people is usually a <kanji>warship</kanji>. They're the big boats that oversee everything around them. And if anyone steps out of line, a warship can take care of it.
readingMnemonic: This huge <kanji>warship</kanji> is run by Genghis <reading>Khan</reading> (かん), the famous warlord. Really, what did you expect? Who else is strong enough to captain a warship but him?
